ComicInfo.Title: Through a Glass Darkly Chapter Four of Snow White
ComicInfo.Summary: Bigby howls back to Castle Dark for a showdown with Prince Brandish for the hand of his/their wife, Snow White. Will anyone walk away alive?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 00:37:13. [CVDB397536] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:33:00. [Issue ID 1103240]
